select
,t2.resolve as resolve ,t2.responseTime as responseTime ,t2.isSelf from t_channel t1 left join (select parentid ,source ,source_px as resolve ,response_time as responseTime ,is_self as isSelf ,sort from t_channel_source where is_delete != 1 ) t2 on t1.id=t2.parentid right join (select channelId, sort from t_channel_hot ) t3 on t1.id = t3.channelId order by t3.sort,t2.sort

select
,t2.resolve as resolve ,t2.responseTime as responseTime ,t2.isSelf ,t3.`key` ,t3.`value` from t_channel t1 left join (select parentid ,source ,source_px as resolve ,response_time as responseTime ,is_self as isSelf ,sort from t_channel_source where is_delete != 1 ) t2 on t1.id=t2.parentid right join (select `value` ,`key` from t_channel_mapping where `key` like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{key}), '%') group by `value` ) t3 on t1.channel = t3.value where t1.channel is not null order by t1.id

select t1.id as i ,t1.channel as c ,t1.appTypeId as t from t_channel t1 right join (select `value` ,`key` from t_channel_mapping where `key` like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{key}), '%') group by `value` ) t3 on t1.channel = t3.value where t1.channel is not null order by t1.id

SELECT t1.id AS i, t1.channel AS c, t2.resolution AS r, t2.response AS m, t2.is_self AS f, t2.id AS s, t3.categoryType as g FROM t_channel t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT resolution, response, is_self, id, parentid, sort FROM t_channel_source WHERE is_delete != 1 ) t2 ON t1.id = t2.parentid LEFT JOIN( SELECT id, categoryType FROM t_category_type ) t3 ON t1.category = t3.id WHERE t1.id = #{id} AND t2.id is not null ORDER BY t1.sort, t2.sort
